price: Mbega none boba bagaba ibigega vy’impano z’Imana yawe Rurema Allah, Nyenintsinzi-Mutaneshwa, Bigaburo Iha uwo Ishatse mu ngabirano zayo Itarinze gusabwa!
arabic: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَحۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡوَهَّابِ

meta.transliteration: am ʿindahum khazāinu raḥmati rabbika al-ʿazīzi al-wahābi
